Text: bloominoctober, you're welcome. i only got into it last year -- i bought the 1st trade for my wife when she had surgery -- and i'm sooo far behind, but that trade was magnificent. enjoy!
I can give another recommendation.  I've become addicted to Morning Glories (Image Comcis) lately.  Simply amazing stuff.  Highly recommend it if you've not checked it out.
i will do that, i read the first 2 issues when they came out a couple years ago. thanks for the rec!
